column4: i don't have hardy yet, but kubuntu hardy is dying this october?
why does kubuntu.org say "Kubuntu 8.04 - Featuring the mature KDE 3 and maintained until October 2009"
is that a date that JDE dies?

Repairing damaged windows partitions is beyond the scope of what we can help with.  I strongly suggest you move that drive to another windows box and use some of the good windows partition repair tools
:( there is none that i can use...
I do this stuff for people all the time..   Windows does have some excellent tools, if you want you can look into hirens cd

this laptop is too weak/old/ruined for me to put anything on it, really. i got to get a new partition table, but i have to backup data, then the backup hdd crashes... i really dnt know what im GONNA do....
Not to be flip, but learn to backup what you cant afford to lose
that IS the back up hard drive
